name: I Dated a Multi-Dimensional Girl (Magus Studios)
name_original: I Dated a Multi-Dimensional Girl (Magus Studios)
description:
I Dated a Multi-Dimensional Girl (Magus Studios) is a game developed by Magus Studios. It was originally released in 2022.
I Dated a Multi-Dimensional Girl (Magus Studios) is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
